Title: Relates to establishing a program to certify certain feed mills, farms, and sellers of food products which produced or used feed that does not contain animal parts
Summary: Establishes a program to certify certain feed mills, farms, and sellers of food products which produced or used feed that does not contain animal parts.
LawCode: Amd §§16, 129 & 130, Ag & Mkts L; add §99-ff, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to development of a program to certify certain feed mills, animals and food products and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing an animal feed certification and registration fund
